Title: Open Source Friday: Open Source Friday Exploring Unlsoth
Description:
This week on Open Source Friday we'll sit down with Daniel Han and Michael Han, the minds behind Unsloth - an open source project redefining how developers fine-tune AI models. Unsloth accelerates training 2–5x faster while using up to 70–90% less VRAM, making custom AI models accessible to everyone. You can check them out at:

Website: unsloth.ai GitHub: github.com/unslothai/unsloth

Join us in celebrating projects like Unsloth that push the boundaries of open source AI innovation! #OpenSourceFriday #AI #Unsloth #GitHubAccelerator
Author: GitHub
